title: Google collaborates with CleanMax to add clean energy capacity in India
description: Google is partnering with Clean Max Enviro Energy Solutions to supply clean power in India. They will develop a 125.4 MW hybrid project, including solar and wind generation. This project aims to support Googleâ€™s goal of 24/7 carbon-free energy and is expected to start operations in late 2025, reducing CO2 emissions significantly.
